About Me

I am a practicing coder. Coding is a computer science that never stops evolving, so one can never be anything more than a practicing coder. I first began coding when traveling through the Southwest as a way to enhance my understanding of computer science as well as geographical science. I hope in time that my coding will help others' lives in some way shape or form.

Work

Portfolio Generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Node

Portfolio Generator is a Node.js project that dynamically creates a portfolio html and css page so that you don't have to start from scratch.

View Project on GitHub

Professional-README-Generator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, Node

Professional-README-Generator is a Node.js project that will generate a README.md page, fully formatted so that you can just answer a few prompts about your project and not worry about creating a whole README.md page from scratch.

View Project on GitHub
